title: Infatuation
description: In this Dateline classic, Shelley Nance, a talented young art student, is found stabbed to death in her bed, sparking a police investigation with many twists and turns. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 13, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
